record.dc:title: 71BY11 Rymer, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burial 15BY122, an indeterminate child. Two shell hairpins (F.S. 1643) lie at skull and shell gorget (F.S. 1642) at right elbow. Square 4R14. Direction NW.
record.wpa:narrative: Indeterminate child in fair condition, extended on back with head to SW. Bones lay just at base of plowline, disturbed by plow, feet missing. Upper part of body disturbed. Shell gorget lying very near on right elbow. Shell hair pins apparently at mastoids. Lower jaw displaced and lying on upper part of right humerus.
